poem.title: The Promised Landfill
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Home is gone and cleared the mortgage If it were dust to sift Not the sliver and slither of others' leavings The janitor's poems of every day The wrapper on the can Tee-shirt on a scavenger Dead to the dump The noose The mair can dream The hindoo cast off system Knouts of need to whip you past That old Plotinian nous And the stink of it DEUS EST AMOR QUI PLUS HABITUS MAGIS LATET God is not The garbage. God is In the garbage.
